about_the_game:
BE the TOFU.

Tofu is one of the most wonderful foods made from soybeans.

Tofu, also known as "meat of the field," is so rich in nutrients that it has been enjoyed by many people since ancient times.
Tofu can be transformed in any way depending on the method of production and preparation.

Tofu Action

This is the one and only Tofu action game created by a real Tofu Meister.
Cotton, silk, and koya. Three types of tofu to choose from, made in 3D using the latest technology.
Enjoy a game experience as simple as to-fu, with one-button operation for quick play.

The ultimate tofu experience

  • Precise vibration/physical feedback to enhance the sense of oneness with the tofu.

  • Tofu is fragile and crumbles when you push it. (Koya-dofu is hard, so it's not a problem.)

  • With a determined tofu-fire📛, jump into the owan before it expires.

  • A large amount of tofu trivia is included to help you learn more about tofu.

  • Includes "Tofu Factory," a mini-game for infinite tofu production.

Volume

  • The volume of the game can be played in an hour or two.

  • No additives like collectibles or hidden routes, just a simple action experience.

  • It is just like eating tofu straight from the pack...

Music

Become fully immersed with an original soundtrack composed by Ryo Nagamatsu of RH Music. Ryo’s versatile sound gives every level its own distinct ambience, captivating audiences as they progress through each course.

name: The Strongest TOFU

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10, windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5.2 GB available space

short_description: Be The TOFU. The one and only Tofu action game created by a real Tofu Meister. You choose one of three varieties, and in its endless journey it gradually softens, crumbles, stews, and acquires bittern to become TOFU.
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
